title: Bug 129561HCGBIDI: Undesirable generation of SQL query elements
description: Bug 129561HCGBIDI: Undesirable generation of SQL query elements This is not even NLS specific defect. Otherwise the query will fail.1. Create table with name including blank in this database. Select "Preview Results"Result: Exception is fired.7. "Table Name". "Column Name"8.
OB: When a table with a name that includes a blank is created in the database, and the "Preview Results" option is selected, an exception is fired.
SR: 1. Create a DB2 database. 2. Ensure that the database has a column with a name that includes a blank. 3. Create a Data Source based on the database from step 1. 4. Create a Data Set based on the table from step 2. 5. On the Query screen, drag and drop the column name from step 2 into the select portion of the clause. 6. Manually change the SQL query as follows: SELECT USER.
